Text:
From The Granite City!!! Wow:-) It's amazing. I've been there twice and loved it. It's very special place.
Now I live in Warsaw. In London, altogether some 12 years, in other places abroad, cant' remember ;-)
I started watching EE long time ago to improve my English ;-))))) and got addicted. It's very 'londonish' and I miss London A LOT.
I hope your friend from Norway meets your expectations :-)
